meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled in technology.
meanings.sent1: The technoids at the company fixed the computer issue quickly.
meanings.sent2: I admire how the technoids can create amazing websites.
meanings.sent3: The technoids joked that they could fix a broken robot with a paperclip.
meanings.sent4: The technoids were like wizards, casting spells to make technology work.
meanings.sent5: The technoids' knowledge of technology is like a treasure chest full of secrets.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who are experts in the field of technology.
meanings.sent1: Our team of technoids collaborated to develop a new software program.
meanings.sent2: The technoids gathered to discuss the latest advancements in AI.
meanings.sent3: The technoids decided to have a tech-off to see who was the best.
meanings.sent4: The technoids stood together like a powerful force of nature in the tech world.
meanings.sent5: The technoids' expertise in technology is like a beacon guiding us through the digital age.
